= Eclipse FAQs =

Change your build path to the correct libraries. Change the build path library for gwt-linux home directory. I set mine to /opt/gwt-linux which is linked to the current Google Web toolkit download that I have.

Another thing to make a note of. I am using ubuntu amd64 and I used galternatives to change the jvm to a 32bit version. I talk about it a little bit more in my blog. More info on galternatives and 32 bit jvm. More info here http://codintips.blogspot.com/2007/11/getting-gwt-working-on-ubuntu-amd64.html
